S04bsu062_u:2532: aho bauddheṣu yaddānaṃ prakṛtaṃ tatphalaṃ śubham /
S04bsu062_u:2544: vāmanaḥ sa mahanmūrttiṃ dhṛtvātiṣṭhat puro mama //
S04bsu062_u:2547: dehi me yattvayā dattaṃ tṛtīyasya padasya me /
S04bsu062_u:2548: sthānaṃ na vidyate kutra sthāpayeyamidaṃ vada //
S04bsu062_u:2549: ekaṃ nyastaṃ mayākāśe dvitīyaṃ ca mahītale //
S04bsu062_u:2550: tṛtīyaṃ me padaṃ kutra sthāpayethā tdaṃ vada //
S04bsu062_u:2557: iti satyaṃ mayā proktaṃ śrutvā sa saṃpraharṣitaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2567: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ śrutvā tīrthikaśāsanam //
S04bsu062_u:2569: mayā na śrūyate kvāpi jñāyate naivamuttamam //
S04bsu062_u:2573: sukṣatre dānasaṃbhūtaṃ naśrutaṃ na mataṃ mayā //
S04bsu062_u:2575: na jñātaṃ tattriratnānāṃ prābhajiṣyan sadā bhave //
S04bsu062_u:2583: satkṛtya śraddhayā gauṇyaṃ śrutvā bhajāni sarvadā //
S04bsu062_u:2584: tathā ya saṃgharatnānāṃ śaraṇe sarvadā sthitaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2602: tatkalaṃ śrīmahatsaukhyaṃ dadyān naiva tu saugatam //
S04bsu062_u:2604: dadasva śraddhayā dānaṃ bauddhaṃ padaṃ yadīcchasi //
S04bsu062_u:2605: evaṃ datvā sadā dānaṃ bodhicitto jitendriyaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2607: vrataṃ vinā na śudhyeta trikāyaṃ mahatāmapi /
S04bsu062_u:2612: kleśotthito jagadduṣṭaḥ kradho hanti kṣaṇena tat //
S04bsu062_u:2619: na hi vīryaṃ vinākāryaṃ sidhyate sudhiyāmapi /
S04bsu062_u:2630: vijñāya tvaṃ sadā sattvahitārthe cara sadvratam //
S04bsu062_u:2637: iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2639: tataḥ sa balirālokya taṃ lokeśaṃ jinātjam /
S04bsu062_u:2646: dharmaratnaṃ ca saṃghāṃśca śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi sarvadā //
S04bsu062_u:2648: dharmeṃ śrutvā ca saṃghānāṃ dāsye yathārhaṃ bhojanam //
S04bsu062_u:2652: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalāsya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇākarāṇām //
S04bsu062_u:2654: yāvanti puṣpāṇi falāni cauvaṃ bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yānio santi /
S04bsu062_u:2655: ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke jalāni ca svacchamanoramāṇi //
S04bsu062_u:2658: devādilokeṣu ca gandhadhūpāḥ kalpadrumā ratnamayāśca vṛkṣāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2665: ato mamārthaya parārthacintā gṛṇantu nāthā idamātmaśaktyā //
S04bsu062_u:2666: dadāmi cātmānamahaṃ jinebhyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca tadātmajebhyaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2667: parigrahaṃ me kurutāgrasattvā yuṣmāsu dāsatvamupaimi bhaktyā //
S04bsu062_u:2669: pūrvaṃ ca pāpaṃ samatikramāmi nānyacca pāpaṃ prakaromi bhūyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2686: yanmayā paśunā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritameva vā //
S04bsu062_u:2699: apriyā na bhaviṣyanti bhaviṣyanti na me priyāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2700: ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu062_u:2713: puṇyamekaṃ tadā trāṇaṃ mayā tatraiva saṃcitam //
S04bsu062_u:2723: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye //
S04bsu062_u:2734: adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yukta me sukhāsikā /
S04bsu062_u:2735: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi kasmānme susthinaṃ manaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2739: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2741: iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātraṃdivaṃ sadā /
S04bsu062_u:2743: mayā duṣṭena mūḍhena yatpāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā /
S04bsu062_u:2758: ityukte balinā tena lokeśvaro niśamya niśamya saḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2759: sādhu sādhviti saṃrādhya taṃ baliṃ caivamabravīt //
S04bsu062_u:2761: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punarapyeṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2762: rātrau yathā meghaghanāndhakāre vidyutkṣaṇaṃ darśayati prakāśam /
S04bsu062_u:2763: buddhānubhāvena tathā kadācillokasya puṇyeṣu matiḥkṣaṇaṃ syāt //
S04bsu062_u:2764: tasmācchubhaṃ durbalameva nityaṃ balaṃ tu pāpasya mahatsughoram /
S04bsu062_u:2765: tajjīyate 'yena śubhena kena saṃbodhicittaṃ yadi nāma na syāt //
S04bsu062_u:2770: bahusaukhyaśatāni bhoktukāmairna vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittam //
S04bsu062_u:2771: bhavacārakabandhano varo kaḥ sugatānāṃ suta ucyate kṣaṇena /
S04bsu062_u:2777: kadalīva falaṃ vihāya yāti kṣayamanyatkuśalaṃ hi sarvameva /
S04bsu062_u:2778: satataṃ falati kṣayaṃ na yāti prasavatyeva hi bodhicittavṛkṣaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2801: tṛptaṃ sarvasukhaiḥ kuryāt sarvāḥ pīḍāśchinatti ca //
S04bsu062_u:2803: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2806: iti mantrayatau jinasya putre kaluṣaṃ svahṛdaye karoti yaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2808: atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato 'dhikaṃ falam //
S04bsu062_u:2812: nādya cet kriyate yatnaṃ talenāpi talaṃ vrajeḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2814: eatān sarvān visaṃvādya kā gatiste bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu062_u:2815: manasā cintayitvā tu yo na dadyāt punarnaraḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2821: ekasyāpi hi sattvasya hitaṃ hitvā hato bhavet /
S04bsu062_u:2828: yadā kuśalayogyo 'pi kuśalaṃ tvaṃ karoṣi na /
S04bsu062_u:2834: yadīdṛśaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prāpya punaḥ sīdasi mohitaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2836: ciraṃ dhakṣyati te kāyam nārakāgni suduḥsahaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2839: na śurā naiva te prājñāḥ kathaṃ dāsīkṛto 'si taiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2841: atra te cetanā nāsti mantrairiva vimohitaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2842: sarve devā manuṣyāśca yadi syustava śatravaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2847: mativeśmani lobhayan jale yadi tiṣṭhanti kuta sukhaṃ tava //
S04bsu062_u:2849: mahārthasiddhyai tu samudyatasya duḥkhāni kasmāttava bādhakāni //
S04bsu062_u:2851: śītātapādivyasanaṃ sahante jagaddhitārtham sahase kathaṃ na //
S04bsu062_u:2855: ye mocayanti bandhāttvāṃ dveṣasteṣu katham tava //
S04bsu062_u:2857: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate //
S04bsu062_u:2866: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate //
S04bsu062_u:2875: mithyā kalpanayā citte pāpāt kāye vyathā yataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2878: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā //
S04bsu062_u:2879: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2897: anyacca kāryaṃ kālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tattanasādhitam //
S04bsu062_u:2903: māni śatruṃ vaśaṃ neti mānaśatruvaśāstu te //
S04bsu062_u:2904: mānena durgatiṃ nītā mūrkhā durdarśanāḥ kṛśāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2906: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrāḥ ye mānaśatruvijayāya vahanti mānam /
S04bsu062_u:2907: ye taṃ sphurantamapi mānaripuṃ nihatya kāmaṃ jane jayafalaṃ pratipādayanti //
S04bsu062_u:2911: yena janmasahasrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2912: avaśyaṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu062_u:2913: naca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvad bādhyate tṛṣā //
S04bsu062_u:2918: bālaiḥ sa bhāgacarito niyataṃ yāti durgatim /
S04bsu062_u:2923: hitamuktāḥ prakupyanti vārayanti ca te hitāt /
S04bsu062_u:2924: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim //
S04bsu062_u:2929: tasmāt prājño na tāmicchedicchāto jāyate bhayam /
S04bsu062_u:2936: na ca pāpamakīrttirvā yadarthaṃ gaṇitā purā //
S04bsu062_u:2940: prakāmaṃ saṃpariṣvajya kiṃ na gacchati nirvṛtim //
S04bsu062_u:2943: yadi na te 'śucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṃgase param /
S04bsu062_u:2955: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirupyatām //
S04bsu062_u:2958: evaṃ śūnyeṣu bhāveṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu062_u:2959: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati //
S04bsu062_u:2960: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
S04bsu062_u:2961: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamānā svabhāvataḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2962: vicāre jīvaloke hi ko nāmātra mariṣyate /
S04bsu062_u:2963: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt //
S04bsu062_u:2985: snātvā snātvā yathā kaścidviśed vahniṃ muhurmuhuḥ /
S04bsu062_u:2997: yasyaiva śravaṇāt trāsastaireva na vinā ratiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:2998: ātmānaṃ ca parāṃścaiva yaḥ śīghra trātumicchati /
S04bsu062_u:3010: yadi dāsyāmi kiṃ bhojye ityātmārthe piśācatā /
S04bsu062_u:3018: ye kecidduġkhitā loke sarve te svasukhecchayā /
S04bsu062_u:3022: na nāmasādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃsāre 'pi kutaḥ sukham /
S04bsu062_u:3024: āstām tāvatparo loko dṛṣṭo 'pyartho na sidhyati /
S04bsu062_u:3028: upadravā ye ca bhavanti loke yāvanti duḥkhāni bhayāni caiva /
S04bsu062_u:3039: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3041: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśrūte /
S04bsu062_u:3042: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ dvesaśalye hṛdi sthite //
S04bsu062_u:3047: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti durjanā gaganopamāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3050: dahatyātmānamevādau paraṃ dhakṣyati vā na vā //
S04bsu062_u:3054: kodhaṃ yo hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca //
S04bsu062_u:3058: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim //
S04bsu062_u:3064: īdṛśāḥ prayayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhava //
S04bsu062_u:3066: yena yāsyanti narakān tvayaiva te hatā nanu //
S04bsu062_u:3068: etānāśritya te pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamatā bahu /
S04bsu062_u:3072: evaṃ budhvā tu sattveṣu kṣāntiṃ dhṛtvā śubhe cara /
S04bsu062_u:3075: na balārthaṃ na cārogyena ca kāyasukhāya te /
S04bsu062_u:3082: puṇye vighnaḥ kṛto 'nenetyatra ko yo na yujyate /
S04bsu062_u:3083: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti na tvetattadupasthitam //
S04bsu062_u:3087: na ca prāvrājake prāpte pravrajya bighna ucyate //
S04bsu062_u:3100: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3106: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam //
S04bsu062_u:3111: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrā yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ ca praviśanti manyum /
S04bsu062_u:3115: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
S04bsu062_u:3116: dṛśyante ete nanu sattvarupāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra //
S04bsu062_u:3123: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīryaṃ bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
S04bsu062_u:3124: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vina gatiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3127: naivāsti tajjagati vastu vicintyamānaṃ nāpnuyādyadiha vīryarathādhiruḍhaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3129: hatvā ripūn jayamanuttamamāpnuvanti viṣṇurjitaṃ tadaha vīryamahāhaṭasya //
S04bsu062_u:3136: yaddevo viyati vimānbavāsino ye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam /
S04bsu062_u:3139: bodhyaṃgadānaṃ pradiśanti sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum //
S04bsu062_u:3142: prajñādhanena vikalaṃ tu narasya rupamālekhya rupamiva sāravihīnamantaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3145: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadā doṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām //
S04bsu062_u:3146: ādeṣṭya cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3148: kāryārṇave vāpi dṛḍhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3149: prajñāvaśātte vijayaṃ labhante prajñā hyataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtā //
S04bsu062_u:3151: na prajñā vikalā vibhānti puruṣāḥ prātāḥpradīpā iva //
S04bsu062_u:3152: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍeva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām /
S04bsu062_u:3153: jñātvā bhavasva hitasādhanatatparastvaṃ kuryā ataḥ satatameva śubhe prayatnam //
S04bsu062_u:3159: yā avasthāḥ prapadyante svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
S04bsu062_u:3160: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3161: na hī tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3162: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3169: ākṛtaṃ kiṃ mayā nātha yajñaṃ tīrthikasammatam /
S04bsu062_u:3170: yasyeha falaṃ bhuṃjāno vasāmyatra janaiḥ saha //
S04bsu062_u:3184: evaṃ stutvā sa daityendro lokanāthaṃ tamīśvaram /
S04bsu062_u:3186: rakṣa māṃ durmatiṃ nātha samuddhara bhavodadheḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3191: kṛtāṃjaliḥ sadā smṛtvā namāmi śaraṇe sthitaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3192: yacca dharmaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ jagaddhite /
S04bsu062_u:3195: tānapyahaṃ sadā smṛtvā bhajāni śaraṇe sthitaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3196: evaṃ tadbhajanaṃ kṛtvā yanmayā sādhitaṃ śubham /
S04bsu062_u:3198: glānānāmasmi bhaiajyaṃ bhaveyaṃ vaidya eva ca /
S04bsu062_u:3206: sarvatyāgaśca nirvāṇaṃ nirvānārthi ca me manaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3207: tyaktavyaṃ cenmayā sarvaṃ varaṃ sattveṣu dīyate //
S04bsu062_u:3209: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃśubhiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3210: krīḍantu mama kāyena hasantu vilasantu ca /
S04bsu062_u:3213: kārayantu ca karmāṇi yāni teṣāṃ sukhāvahe /
S04bsu062_u:3215: yeṣāṃ kruddhā prasannā vā māmālambya matirbhavet /
S04bsu062_u:3216: sa eva teṣāṃ hetuḥ syānnityaṃ sarvārthasiddhaye //
S04bsu062_u:3217: atyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye 'pyapakāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3220: pārepsunāṃ ca naubhūtaḥ setuḥ saṃkrama eva ca //
S04bsu062_u:3232: tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣisyāmi yathākramam //
S04bsu062_u:3233: adya me safalaṃ janma sulabdhāḥ sārasaṃpadaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3250: jagadadya mayā nimantritaṃ sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā /
S04bsu062_u:3254: ārādhanā yādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmana dāsamupaimi loke /
S04bsu062_u:3255: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3262: ko vā tvaṃ praṇipatya sāndrakaruṇāṃ prahlāditādhyāśayaṃ
S04bsu062_u:3266: na tvevaikapi kṣaṇaṃ surapure saṃbuddhaśūnye jagaty
S04bsu062_u:3268: tadyāvanna patati sarva eva loko durdṛṣṭivratavivṛte pramādakūpe
S04bsu062_u:3282: na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittamarakṣatā //
S04bsu062_u:3283: adāntā mattamātaṃgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām /
S04bsu062_u:3287: vyāghrāḥ sihāṃ gajā ṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ sarve ca śatravaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3294: cittādeva hi sarvatra bhayaṃ bhadraṃ ca jāyate //
S04bsu062_u:3296: taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāśca tā striyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:3303: dānapāramitā proktā tasmāt sā cittameva hi //
S04bsu062_u:3308: bhūmiṃ chādayituṃ sarvāṃ kutaḥ carma bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu062_u:3310: bāhyā bhāvāstathā sarvā na śakyā vārayituṃ kvacit /
S04bsu062_u:3316: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ bhramanti te mudhāmbare /
S04bsu062_u:3322: lābhā naśyantu te kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam /
S04bsu062_u:3323: naśyatvanyacca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana //
S04bsu062_u:3365: pramātuṃ śakyate naiva mayaikena kathaṃ khalu //
S04bsu062_u:3368: yadyevaṃ carase rājan kvāpi na durgatiṃ vrajeḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3370: svaparātmahitaṃ kṛtvā bhuktvā saukhyaṃ sadā bhaveḥ /
S04bsu062_u:3440: mayā te hitamākhyātaṃ budhvā dhartuṃ yadīcchasi //
S04bsu062_u:3452: tadā tasya suhatatrātā kaścideko 'pi naiva hi /
S04bsu062_u:3454: tataḥ sa yamadūtena badhvā saṃtarjya neṣyate /

S04bsu062_u:6580: bhagavan bhava me trātā bhartā gatiḥ parāyaṇaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6586: sthāpaya māṃ śubhe dharme saṃpreraya sunirvṛtim //

S04bsu062_u:6647: gṛhītvā tāṃ jagadbhartā muktāmālāṃ sa dakṣiṇām /

S04bsu062_u:6674: dadhata ye ca bhāsanti manasā cintayantyapi /
S04bsu062_u:6686: yo mudā śraddhayā nityaṃ japedimāṃ ṣadakṣarīm /
S04bsu062_u:6697: tatrāhaṃ bhavatā śāstrā preṣaṇīyo hi sarvathā //
S04bsu062_u:6701: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ sa saṃtiṣṭhate japan sadā //
S04bsu062_u:6706: bhagavanstatra yāsyāmi yatra śāstā sa tiṣṭhate /
S04bsu062_u:6711: vārāṇasyāṃ mahāpuryāṃ sthitaṃ taṃ sadguruṃ bhaje //
S04bsu062_u:6721: draṣṭavyaḥ sa tvayā naiva kulaputra tadanyathā /
S04bsu062_u:6722: vicikitsā na kartavyā dṛṣṭvā taṃ dharmabhāṇakam /

S04bsu062_u:6759: tatra sa mudito dharmabhāṇakasya puro gataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6765: iti vijñapya tasyāgre śāstuḥ sa sugatātmajaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6779: śṛṇvanti ye sadā dharmaṃ bhavataḥ samupāśritāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6793: bhajanti bhavatāṃ ye ca śaraṇe samupasthitāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6797: jānante tava saṃbuddhāḥ sarve 'pi daśadik sthitāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6802: ye te dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā bhajanti samupasthitāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:6812: kati mārṣāḥ kila kleśāḥ saṃsāra aupabhāgikāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:6819: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sa vinoditaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6841: trātā nātho guruḥ śāstā sanmitraṃ sadguṇārthabhṛt /
S04bsu062_u:6844: iti saṃprārthite tena śrutvā sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6861: puṇyakṣetre gṛhe ranme pīṭhe pretālaye 'pi ca //
S04bsu062_u:6869: sunirvṛtiṃ na te yānti kṛtvāpi duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6871: ye ca santo mahāsattvā bodhisattvāḥ śubhārthinaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6913: tato buddhapadaṃ prāpya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat //
S04bsu062_u:6968: evaṃ te ca jagallokaṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā pramoditāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:6973: yasyā anusmṛtimātreṇa sarve naṣṭā hi pāpakāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:6974: ya enāṃ japate nityaṃ tasya yaḥ cīvaraṃ spṛśet /
S04bsu062_u:6986: smaraṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ cāpi vinā puṇyairna labhyate //
S04bsu062_u:6987: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa saṃpramoditaḥ /

S04bsu062_u:7006: kuto 'yaṃ carate śabda iti dhyātvā vyalokayet //

S04bsu062_u:7012: dṛṣṭvā taṃ khe kajālīnaṃ bodhisattvaṃ jinātmajam /

S04bsu062_u:7020: iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7024: iti vijñapya lokeśaṃ tataḥ sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7034: tatkṣaṇe sācalā sābdhiścacāla ṣaḍ vidhā mahī /
S04bsu062_u:7038: tataḥ sa suprasannāatmā śatre tasmai sadakṣiṇām /
S04bsu062_u:7041: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mahābhijño dharmiṣṭho dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7044: vaineyo bodhisattvastat gṛhṇīyāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ na te //
S04bsu062_u:7045: etā ekākṣarasyāpi paryāptā na tu dakṣiṇā /
S04bsu062_u:7046: prāgeva ṣaḍakṣarāṇāṃ gṛhṇiyāṃ te tathāpi na //
S04bsu062_u:7047: tacchrutvā sa mahābhijño viṣkambhī tasya sadguroḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7053: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sa vinoditaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7056: iti vijñapya taṃ muktāhāraṃ natvā samādade //
S04bsu062_u:7057: tataḥ sa suprasannātmā viṣkambhī tasya sadguroḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7061: tatra sa dūrataḥ paśyan bhagavantaṃ sabhāśritam /
S04bsu062_u:7065: tatra sa bhagavān paśyan viṣkambhinaṃ samāgatam /
S04bsu062_u:7074: adya me safalaṃ janma buddhaputro 'smi sāmpratam /
S04bsu062_u:7078: iti tenoditam śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7083: saṃbuddhairbhāṣitā yā tāṃ dāsyāmi te jagaddhite //
S04bsu062_u:7104: tataḥ sa trijagacchāstā kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /
S04bsu062_u:7107: eṣā tvayā sadā dhāryā paṭhanīyā jagaddhite //
S04bsu062_u:7115: dhṛtvā saṃpāṭhitā nityaṃ deśitā ca jagaddhite //
S04bsu062_u:7120: āa oṃ cale cūle cunde svāhetyetannavākṣaram /
S04bsu062_u:7122: śāstrā svayaṃ pradattaṃ tāṃ mahāvidyāṃ navākṣarīm /
S04bsu062_u:7124: dhṛtvā viṣkambhinā śāstuḥ pāṭhemānā guroḥ puraḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7137: kati santi tanau tasya sarvadharmādhipassya hi /
S04bsu062_u:7139: iti saṃprārthite te viṣkambhinā sa sarvavit /
S04bsu062_u:7147: tattasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā smṛtvā samāhitaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7149: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā smṛtvāpi sarvadā /
S04bsu062_u:7151: durgatiṃ te na gacchanti yānti sadgatimeva hi /
S04bsu062_u:7172: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7195: iti saṃprārthite tena viṣkambhinā sa sarvavit /
S04bsu062_u:7201: idānīṃ sa jagannāthaḥ sarvān sattvān bhavodadheḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7252: ityādiṣṭaṃ sa munīndreṇa śrutvā maheśvaro mudā /
S04bsu062_u:7253: lokeśasya puro gatvā pādābje praṇatiṃ vyadhāt //
S04bsu062_u:7262: ityevaṃ sa maheśānaṃ sthutvā taṃ śrīguṇākaram /
S04bsu062_u:7294: sarvasattvān vaśe sthāpya dharmarājo balī bhaveḥ //
S04bsu062_u:7302: tatastvaṃ bhagavān sarvaṃ kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat //
S04bsu062_u:7315: ityumā sā mahādevī saṃtuṣṭā taṃ jinātmajam /
S04bsu062_u:7321: iti tayā mahādevyā saṃprārthitaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7323: bhagini tvaṃ mahādevi nirvṛtiṃ yadi vāṃchasi /
S04bsu062_u:7334: umeśvara iti khyātaḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān jinaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7343: atha sa bhagavān sarvān sabhālokān samīkṣya tam /
S04bsu062_u:7361: sarveṣāmapi teṣāḥ sa lokanāthaḥ śiraḥ spṛśan /
S04bsu062_u:7368: iti saṃprārthite tena lokeśena sa sarvavit /
S04bsu062_u:7371: upahṛtya puraḥ pṛcchaḥ kauśalyaṃ madgirā nameḥ //
S04bsu062_u:7373: bhagavantaṃ praṇatvā ca sabhāṃ samīkṣya prācarat //
S04bsu062_u:7378: samīkṣya taṃ samāyātaṃ lokeśvaraṃ sa sarvavit /
S04bsu062_u:7382: kiyanto hi tvayā sattvā samuddhṛtāḥ kutaḥ kutaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7390: evaṃ tān sakalān sattvān kṛtvā saṃbodhisādhinaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7398: sa mayā vyākṛto bodhau somāpi vyākṛtā tathā //
S04bsu062_u:7404: idaṃ ratmayaṃ padmaṃ kauśalyaṃ cāpi pṛcchyate //
S04bsu062_u:7419: āśā sampūrṇasiddhā ca sambodhiṃ prāptavān bhave //
S04bsu062_u:7424: iti saṃprārthite tena viṣkambhinā sa sarvavit /
S04bsu062_u:7433: teṣāṃ saṃkhyāpramāṇāni kartuṃ mayā hi śakyate //
S04bsu062_u:7457: tadā tasya munīndrasya pātuṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ mudā /
S04bsu062_u:7462: siddhāḥ sādhyāśca rudrāśca sarve vidyādharā api //
S04bsu062_u:7463: rājānaḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā amātyā mantriṇo janāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7514: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃstān sugatātmajān /
S04bsu062_u:7529: sādhu śṛṇu samādhāya vakṣye taditi prādiśat //
S04bsu062_u:7566: mṛtyukāle 'pi teṣāṃ ca dvādaśa sugatā jināḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7582: iti taiḥ sugataiḥ sarvaiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya te /
S04bsu062_u:7584: tataste tān jinān smṛtvā prāṇaṃ tyaktvā samāhitāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7595: yūyaṃ sarve 'pi vijñāya saṃbodhiṃ yadi vāṃcchatha /
S04bsu062_u:7609: bhagavantaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ natvā svasvālayaṃ yayuḥ //
S04bsu062_u:7616: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7630: na sthātavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ krīḍitavyaṃ na ca kvacit //
S04bsu062_u:7638: na teṣāṃ sāṃghikī bhūmirnaivārhati kuhāpi hi //
S04bsu062_u:7643: bhagavan katame kāle duḥśīlā bhikṣavaḥ śaṭhāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7650: tatra te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhraṣṭācārā durāśayāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7666: dantakāṣṭhādikaṃ hṛtvā prabhuṃ sfūrya ca sāṃghikam //

S04bsu062_u:7677: evaṃ te bahuvarṣāṇi duḥkhāni vividhāni ca /
S04bsu062_u:7679: ye cāpi sāṃghikīṃ bhūmiṃ paribhojyanti lobhinaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7688: evaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi duḥkhāni vividhāni te //
S04bsu062_u:7690: tatra teṣāṃ mahajjihvā prodbhavedapi tatra ca //
S04bsu062_u:7692: tathāpi te mṛtā naiva sthāsyanti duḥkhitāściram //

S04bsu062_u:7708: kenāpi sāṃghikaṃ vastu jīrṇīkartuṃ na śakyate //
S04bsu062_u:7714: sāṃghikiṃ vastu hartuṃ na pāpaṃ kenāpi śamyate //
S04bsu062_u:7716: sāṃghikaṃ vastu yatnena rakṣitavyaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ sadādarāt //
S04bsu062_u:7720: na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittamarakṣatā //
S04bsu062_u:7721: adāntā mattamātaṃgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām /
S04bsu062_u:7725: vyāghrāḥ siṃhā gajā ṛkṣā sarve ca duṣṭaśatravaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7732: taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāśca tāḥ striyaḥ //

S04bsu062_u:7886: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeśacāpi garhitam //
S04bsu062_u:7888: pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhū mardayet samam //
S04bsu062_u:7890: lokāprasāditaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṭvā pṛṭvā sa varjayet //
S04bsu062_u:7899: rātriṃ divaṃ ca triskandhaṃ trikālaṃ ca pravartayet /
S04bsu062_u:7901: yo avasthāḥ prapadyate svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /

S04bsu062_u:7928: naivaṃ dviṣaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvamapi ghnataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7929: krodhamekaṃ tu yo hanyāttena sarvadviṣo hatāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:7933: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim //
S04bsu062_u:7943: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhiḥ naiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
S04bsu062_u:7944: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarupāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādanātra //
S04bsu062_u:7957: evaṃ kṣamo bhavedvīryaṃ vīrye boddhiryataḥ sthitaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:7958: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyu vinā gatiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:7968: hatvā ripūn jayamanuttamamāpnuvanti visfurjitaṃ tadiha vīryaṃ mahābhaṭasya //
S04bsu062_u:7976: yaddevā viyati vimānavāsino 'nye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam /
S04bsu062_u:7981: karmāgamādyathā pūrvaṃ sajjaḥ sarvatra ca tu te //
S04bsu062_u:7988: snehānna tyajyate loko lābhādiṣu ca tṛṣṇayā /
S04bsu062_u:7991: śamathaḥ prathamaṃ gaveṣaṇīyaḥ sa ca loke nirapekṣayabhiratyā //
S04bsu062_u:7993: yena janmasahastrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:7994: apaśyannaratiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu062_u:7995: na ca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvavadbādhate tṛṣā //
S04bsu062_u:8005: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim /
S04bsu062_u:8019: bodhyaṃgadānaṃ pradiśantiṃ sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum //
S04bsu062_u:8025: dhyānaṃ tatraikahetuṃ sakalaguṇanidhiṃ prāhuḥ sarve narendrāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8032: imaṃ parikaraṃ sarvaṃ prajñārthaṃ hi jagaddhite /
S04bsu062_u:8040: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8044: prajñādhanena vikulaṃ tu narasya rupamālekhya rupamiva sāravihīnamantaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8045: buddhayānvitasya falamiṣṭamudeti vīryādvīryaṃ hi buddhirahitaṃ svavadhāya śatruḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8047: madhyāntamādyapi janaḥ pravetti prajñābalaṃ tatkathayanti tajjñāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8049: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadādoṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām //
S04bsu062_u:8050: ādeṣṭā cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8052: kāryārṇave 'pi dṛḍhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8053: prajñāvaśātte vijayaṃ labhante prajñā hyataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8054: prajñābalenaiva jināḥ jayanti ghoraṃ suduṣṭaṃ ca mārasainyam /
S04bsu062_u:8055: prajñāviśeṣeṇa janā vibhānti prajñā hi khyātā jananī jinānām //
S04bsu062_u:8059: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhanabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍeva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām /
S04bsu062_u:8060: jñātvā naraḥ svahitasādhanatatparaḥ syātkuryādataḥ satatamāśu dṛḍhaṃ prayatnam //
S04bsu062_u:8078: teṣāmeva sadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvam /
S04bsu062_u:8093: atha te sāṃghikāḥ sarve ānandapramukhāḥ mudā /
S04bsu062_u:8104: jitvā māragaṇānarhan bodhiṃ prāpya jino bhaveḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8105: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8109: atha bhūyaḥ sa rājendro bhūpo 'śokaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8116: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditam /
S04bsu062_u:8126: duḥkhāgnau patito yo 'pi smṛtvā lokeśvaraṃ bhajet /
S04bsu062_u:8133: tataḥ sa sahasottīrya smṛtvā dharmarato bhavet //
S04bsu062_u:8134: yadā ca vaṇijaḥ sārthā naukāruḍhā mahāmbudhau /
S04bsu062_u:8138: tadā teṣāṃ mahādhīraḥ smṛtvā lokeśvaraṃ namet /
S04bsu062_u:8140: tatastāḥ kālikā vātā na careyuḥ prasāditāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8141: tato nau savaṇiksārthā svasti ratnākaraṃ vrajet //
S04bsu062_u:8143: tatra te vaṇijaḥ sarve labdharatnāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8144: svasti pratyāgatāḥ svasti samiyuḥ svapuraṃ laghu //
S04bsu062_u:8147: yaśca duṣṭo vadhāt sṛṣṭo gṛhīto vadhyaghātakaiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8150: tataste ghātakāḥ sarve taṃ hantuṃ nābhiśaknuyuḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8151: yadi vighātito daivāt tyaktvā pāpāśrayāṃ mṛtaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8153: sarve yakṣāśca gandharvāḥ kumbhāṇḍā rākṣasā api /
S04bsu062_u:8154: kinnarā garuḍā nāgā bhūtāḥ pretāḥ piśācikāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8164: tadā te dhūrtakāścaurāḥ sarve yāyuḥ parāṅmukhāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8168: tadā sa vyādhito mukto nīrogī puṣṭitendriyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8176: tadā sa śrīguṇotpanno bhavet sāadhuḥ śubhendriyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8188: tadā sa vijayan sarvān saṃsthāpayennije vaśe //
S04bsu062_u:8193: yo 'putraḥ putraratnārthī taṃ lokeśaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8199: vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ dhanārthi labhate dhanam /
S04bsu062_u:8202: dravyārthī labhate dravyaṃ guṇārthī labhate guṇam /
S04bsu062_u:8203: bhogyārthī labhate bhojyaṃ gṛhārthī labhate gṛham //
S04bsu062_u:8214: yasya lokeśvare bhaktistasya pāpaṃ na kiṃcana /
S04bsu062_u:8216: sarve duṣṭagaṇā mārāḥ kṣīyante sarvataḥ sadā /
S04bsu062_u:8231: ye bhajanti sadā nityaṃ lokeśvaraṃ jagatprabhum /
S04bsu062_u:8232: teṣāṃ naiva bhayaṃ kiṃcitsarvatra sarvadāpi hi //
S04bsu062_u:8237: varuṇāśca hi rājāśca sarve vāyugaṇā api /
S04bsu062_u:8238: sarve śrīdādayo yakṣāḥ sarve bhūtādhipā api //
S04bsu062_u:8240: sarve siddhāśca sādhyāśca rudrā vidyādharā api //
S04bsu062_u:8251: tathā ca yoginaḥ siddhā avikalpā jitendriyāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8256: vaiṣṇavā api śaivāśca liṃgino vratino 'pi ca //
S04bsu062_u:8260: arhanto bhikṣavaścāpi dṛṣṭgā taṃ dūrato mudā /
S04bsu062_u:8276: durgatiṃ te na gacchinta kadācana kathaṃcana /
S04bsu062_u:8283: so 'pi na durgatiṃ yāti yāti sadgatimeva hi //
S04bsu062_u:8310: bhāvayet satataṃ smṛtvā dhyātvāpi praṇayen mudā //
S04bsu062_u:8321: sarvāḥ pāramitā devyaḥ sarve saṃghā jinātmajāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8339: matvā taṃ trijagannāthaṃ bhajasva sarvadā smaran //
S04bsu062_u:8340: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā samāhitāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:8341: nāmāpi ca samuccārya bhajanti śraddhayā sadā //
S04bsu062_u:8343: kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya kṛtvā ceyuḥ śubhaṃ sadā //
S04bsu062_u:8351: tataḥ prabhṛti rājā sa lokeśaṃ sarvadā smaran /
S04bsu062_u:8352: dhyātvā nāma samuccārya prāabhajat pālayan prajāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:8353: tadā tasya narendrasya viṣaye tatra sarvadā /
S04bsu062_u:8361: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalāḥ sadā /
S04bsu062_u:8368: tatra teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kurvantu maṃgalaṃ sadā //
S04bsu062_u:8389: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu062_u:8390: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodhaṃ evaṃvādī mahaśramaṇaḥ //
